main event: On April 4, 1949, a civilian reported witnessing an unidentified aerial object resembling a white parachute in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 minutes during which it was seen moving in a straight flight pattern., The object appeared to be 1/4 the size of the moon and shone brightly in the daylight sky., It was described as having no sound and fading from sight behind trees., The observer reported that the object seemed to grow smaller as it moved away., Weather conditions were reported as CAVU (Ceiling And Visibility Unlimited).
sighted object: a round shining object resembling a parachute
witness description: a civilian observer traveling in a car
